data.text: @Cromwells_House @Aimuseums @BiffaAward @wolfsonfdn @vidarmedia @Cromwellorg @EnglishCivilWar @Sealed_Knot @_paullay @JDjanogly @camillajnichol Thank you, that's very much appreciated! 😀

@MuseumCromwell @Aimuseums @BiffaAward @wolfsonfdn @vidarmedia @Cromwellorg @EnglishCivilWar @Sealed_Knot @_paullay @JDjanogly @camillajnichol It has been an enormous pleasure to follow you on this journey. Your successes are a deserved reflection of the hard work of your team of Volunteers and yourselves.

@MuseumCromwell @Aimuseums @BiffaAward @wolfsonfdn @vidarmedia @Cromwellorg @EnglishCivilWar @Sealed_Knot @_paullay @JDjanogly @camillajnichol If it is before September 10th, then I would absolutely loved to be involved (as I will be in Suffolk for the whole of August and then Sandringham for the 10th and 11th of September!)

@HarryHayfield @Aimuseums @BiffaAward @wolfsonfdn @vidarmedia @Cromwellorg @EnglishCivilWar @Sealed_Knot @_paullay @JDjanogly @camillajnichol Tempting! Actually, we may look at something in the autumn as it's our 60th birthday as a Museum then (opened 1962). 😀

@MuseumCromwell @Aimuseums @BiffaAward @wolfsonfdn @vidarmedia @Cromwellorg @EnglishCivilWar @Sealed_Knot @_paullay @JDjanogly @camillajnichol I was going to say, who could have seen what was going to happen. Can I ask therefore when everything is completely back to normal (i.e March 2023) would you be tempted to do this again and have another grand re-opening without any restrictions at all?
